thread.section_title: Chewy.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Chewy.com | chewy.com
thread.title: Miranda tromp

author: Miranda tromp
title: Miranda tromp
text: I have always ordered through this company for my pets and couldn't be happier. Last week I ordered a New Guinea pig cage and happened to find one I liked better on another website so I asked for a return label. Chewy refunded my money and asked that the cage be donated to a local shelter instead of shipping it back! I was shocked at their kindness and my local shelter was very pleased and grateful for their donation!
